nodes.text: A terrorist attack was carried out by the Duroon Rebels against Corporate Sector Authority officials at a promotional screening of Who Are You To Accuse Me? in Mondder, the capital city of the planet Etti IV. An individual serving as Assistant Advisory Undersecretary of Media was saved from death by a Tiss'shar gunslinger who was working as a bodyguard for a minor official of Millennium Entertainments.
